trans-unit.resname: OC16·28 | Atraxa, Praetors' Voice | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

trans-unit.resname: OC16·29 | Breya, Etherium Shaper | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Breya, Etherium Shaper enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. {2}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Choose one — • Breya deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. • You gain 5 life.

trans-unit.resname: OC16·36 | Kynaios and Tiro of Meletis | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card. Each player may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield, then each opponent who didn't draws a card.

trans-unit.resname: OC16·36 | Kynaios and Tiro of Meletis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Look what we fought for. Look what we built together."

trans-unit.resname: OC16·41 | Saskia the Unyielding | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, haste As Saskia the Unyielding enters the battlefield, choose a player. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to the chosen player.

trans-unit.resname: OC16·50 | Yidris, Maelstrom Wielder | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Trample Whenever Yidris, Maelstrom Wielder deals combat damage to a player, as you cast spells from your hand this turn, they gain cascade. (When you cast the spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
